nodes.bodyText: Would it make sense to call it /remotepoller/availability/{applicationId} and /remotepoller/availability/{applicationId}/{monitoredServiceId}? That way don't have to break the API later when we want to publish also other information from a remote poller application, like status or whatever we need to publish?
